page.title: 10The Blacksmith.
page.content: The land around Great Brickhill has always been popular for horses. Today there are stud farms situated around the village.The original Blacksmith's shop was burned down so another house was built. The old workshop is still in use for shoeing all the horses around the village. This village has always been the centre of many stables. Some of the original tools are still used in the blacksmith's shop. The original bellows are still used for the fire. The Blacksmith family in Great Brickhill was always called 'Smith' but today the Blacksmiths family are called 'Head'.
